description: Community group coordination for neighborhood associations, clubs, and volunteer organizations
use_case: Real community group workflow for managing events, volunteers, communications, and resources

workflow_steps.name: community_setup
workflow_steps.description: Initialize community group structure and member onboarding
workflow_steps.automation: Auto-generate member welcome packages, directory updates

workflow_steps.name: event_coordination
workflow_steps.description: Plan, organize, and execute community events and meetings
workflow_steps.automation: Event registration, volunteer matching, reminder notifications

workflow_steps.name: volunteer_management
workflow_steps.description: Coordinate volunteer activities, track hours, and recognize contributions
workflow_steps.automation: Skill-based volunteer matching, hour logging, achievement badges

workflow_steps.name: resource_sharing
workflow_steps.description: Manage shared community resources, equipment, and spaces
workflow_steps.automation: Availability calendars, usage statistics, maintenance scheduling

workflow_steps.name: community_engagement
workflow_steps.description: Foster communication, feedback, and collaborative decision-making
workflow_steps.automation: Engagement metrics, voting notifications, newsletter compilation
